original_text: For before those days there was no wage for man or any wage for beast, neither was there any safety from the foe for him who went out or came in, for I set every man against his neighbor.
korean_text: 이 날 전에는 사람도 삯을 얻지 못하였고 짐승도 삯을 받지 못하였으며 사람이 원수로 말미암아 평안히 출입하지 못하였으나 내가 모든 사람을 서로 풀어 주게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: For before those days there was no wage for man
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날들 전에는 사람에게 삯이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: neither was there any safety from the foe
for him who went out or came in
for I set every man against his neighbor
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내가 모든 사람을 이웃에게 대적하게 하였음이라
